task.title: Assigning a ticket
task.shortdesc: The first step is to assign a ticket to yourself. Follow the steps as mentioned below:

step.cmd: Open your ZOHO Desk account and navigate to Tickets Tab > All Tickets > Team XXX

stepresult.p: All the available tickets under Team XXX will be visible now.

step.cmd: Click on Assign button for the ticket you wish to select.
step.info: It is situated at the right side of the ticket.

step.cmd: Choose your name from the drop-down list.

note.p: Always pick Team XXX tickets. Make sure the system displays your initials after you make a selection.
